reviews.author: Coffee Lover
reviews.text: Für Kaffee-Liebhaber ein Muss! Toller Cappuccino, gemütliche Atmosphäre und freundlicher Service.

reviews.author: Berlin Visitor
reviews.text: Perfect spot for a coffee break in Tempelhof. Excellent quality, vegan cake options available, and very cozy atmosphere. The owner is super friendly!

reviews.author: Local Regular
reviews.text: My favorite espresso bar in Berlin! Homemade cakes, amazing coffee, and always a warm welcome. The quality is consistently excellent.
